description:
Currently we can show most of instance actions, but we can't get lock/unlock action. 

Add lock/unlock record to instance action list may be useful for audit. In addition, the ``locked_by`` field in database only store
"admin" or "owner" rather than user id, so we can't find the real owner
of server's lock via Nova API, this idea may compensate for this deficiency.

I expect this can be a wishlist.
title: instance action not record lock and unlock event

comments.content:
There are other actions related to the instance, that are not being logged.
Some of them being:
(i) Create snapshot of an instance
(ii) Attach/Detach volume to/from an instance
(iii) Attach/Detach security groups to an instance

The idea being basically to make instance action logs more comprehensive, if we can.
